About us

Blue Project | Our friends | About us

The main purpose and the final goal of the project is to raise the awareness of the importance of dolphin and marine turtle protection and it is approved by and cofinanced from European Social Fund (ESF).

Agronauta association is the project coordinator with the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine and Marine Educational Center Pula as partners.

The project is supported by:

  • Tourist Board Krapanj-Brodarica
  • Zlarin Tourist Board
  • Tourist Board Vodice
  • Skradin Tourist Board
  • Tourist Board of Murter-Kornati municipality
  • Tourist Board Pirovac
  • Šibenik Tourist Board
  • Tourist Board of Šibenik-Knin County
  • Rogoznica Tourist Board
